00055 const cfp::Compound& 
00056 InputData::empiricalFormula() const
00057 {
00058         return mFormulaParser.empirical();

00061 void 
00062 InputData::addAlias(const QString& name)
00063 {
00064         mDB->addAlias(name, empiricalFormula());
00065 //      Element newElem;
00066 //      newElem.setProperty<int>(Element::ELECTRONS_PROPERTY,
00067 //                               get("number of electrons").toInt());

00070 void 
00071 InputData::interpretFormula(const QString& formulaKey)
00072 {
00073         QVariant var(mData.value(formulaKey));
00074 #ifdef DEBUG
00075         if (!var.isValid() || !var.canConvert(QVariant::ByteArray)) {
00076                 std::cerr << "InputData: Can't retrieve formula !" << std::endl;
00077         }
00078 #endif
00079         QByteArray formula(var.toByteArray());
00080         // may throw an exception
00081         mFormulaParser.process(formula.data(), formula.length());
00082 
00083         std::stringstream ss;
00084         ss << mFormulaParser.empirical();
00085         set(formulaKey, QVariant(QString::fromStdString(ss.str())));
00086 
00087         CompleteList elemList;
00088         buildCompleteList(elemList, mFormulaParser.empirical());
00089 }
00090 
00091 void 
00092 InputData::buildCompleteList(CompleteList& list, const cfp::Compound& comp)
00093 {
00094         foreach(cfp::CompoundElement e, comp) 
00095         {
00096                 Element::Ptr ep = mDB->getElement(e);
00097                 if (!ep.isNull()) {
00098                         list.append(ElemPair(e, ep));
00099                 } else {
00100                         const cfp::Compound subComp = mDB->getAlias(e);
00101                         if (subComp.size() > 0) {
00102                                 buildCompleteList(list, subComp);
00103                         } else {
00104                                 throw ErrorUnknownElement(e);
00105                         }
00106                 }
00107         }
00108         calcData(list);
00109 }
00110 
00111 void 
00112 addComplex2Map(QVariantMap& map, const char * key, complex c)
00113 {
00114         QVariantList list;
00115         list.append(QVariant(c.real()));
00116         list.append(QVariant(c.imag()));
00117         map.insert(key, QVariant(list));
00118 }

00120 double 
00121 InputData::calcElectrons(const CompleteList& cl,
00122                          QVariantMap&        partialElectrons)
00123 {
00124         double totalElectrons = 0.0;
00125         CompleteList::const_iterator it = cl.begin();
00126         for(;it != cl.end(); it++) {
00127                 QString name(it->first.uniqueName().c_str());
00128                 double electrons = 
00129                         (it->first.coefficient() * it->second->electrons());
00130                 partialElectrons.insert(name, QVariant(electrons));
00131                 totalElectrons += electrons;
00132         }
00133         partialElectrons.insert("value", QVariant(totalElectrons));
00134         set("number of electrons", QVariant(partialElectrons));
00135         return totalElectrons;
00136 }
00137 
00138 void 
00139 InputData::calcMassAndVolume(const CompleteList& cl,
00140                              QVariantMap&        partialVolume,
00141                              double&             totalMass,
00142                              double&             totalVolume)
00143 {
00144         QVariantMap partialMass;
00145         double compoundDensity = get("ntrDensity").toDouble();
00146         totalMass = 0.0;
00147         totalVolume = 0.0;
00148         CompleteList::const_iterator it = cl.begin();
00149         for(;it != cl.end(); it++) {
00150                 // calculate partial values
00151                 double weight = (it->first.coefficient() * it->second->atomicMass());
00152                 double volume = 1e-2 * weight / (avogadro() * compoundDensity);
00153 
00154                 // create element name from nucleon number and symbol
00155                 QString name(it->first.uniqueName().c_str());
00156 
00157                 // add partial values to result and calculate total value
00158                 partialMass.insert(name, QVariant(weight));
00159                 totalMass += weight;
00160                 partialVolume.insert(name, QVariant(volume));
00161                 totalVolume += volume;
00162         }
00163 
00164         // volume ratios do not make sense here, as the density is entered manually
00165 
00166         // calculate mass percentages
00167         QVariantMap massComposition;
00168         QVariantMap::const_iterator mit = partialMass.constBegin();
00169         while(mit != partialMass.constEnd()) {
00170                 double percentage = 100.0 * mit.value().toDouble()/totalMass;
00171                 massComposition.insert(mit.key(), QVariant(percentage));
00172                 mit++;
00173         }
00174 
00175         QVariantMap masses;
00176         masses.insert("value", QVariant(totalMass));
00177         masses.insert("partial masses g/mol", QVariant(partialMass));
00178         masses.insert("mass ratios %", QVariant(massComposition));
00179         set("molecular mass g/mol", QVariant(masses));
00180 
00181         partialVolume.insert("value", QVariant(totalVolume));
00182         set("molecular volume nm^3", QVariant(partialVolume));
00183 }
00184 
00185 void 
00186 InputData::calcNSL(const CompleteList& cl, 
00187                    double              totalVolume,
00188                    QVariantMap&        neutron,
00189                    complex (Element::*func)(void) const,
00190                    const char        * slText,
00191                    const char        * sldText)
00192 {
00193         complex totalSL(0.0, 0.0);
00194         complex totalSLD(0.0, 0.0);
00195         QVariantMap partialSLD;
00196         CompleteList::const_iterator it = cl.begin();
00197         for(;it != cl.end(); it++) {
00198                 complex sl = (it->first.coefficient() * ((*it->second).*func)());
00199                 complex sld = 1e8 * (sl / totalVolume);
00200                 addComplex2Map(partialSLD, it->first.uniqueName().c_str(), sld);
00201                 totalSL += sl;
00202                 totalSLD += sld;
00203         }
00204 
00205         addComplex2Map(partialSLD, "value", totalSLD);
00206         addComplex2Map(neutron, slText, totalSL);
00207         neutron.insert(sldText, partialSLD);
00208 }
00209 
00210 double 
00211 interpolate(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, double x3)
00212 {
00213         return (x3-x1) * (y2-y1)/(x2-x1) + y1;
00214 }
00215 
00216 complex 
00217 sldXray(double electrons, double fp, double fpp, double vol)
00218 {
00219         complex sld(
00220                 (electrons - pow(electrons/82.5, 2.37) + fp)
00221                         * electronRadius() / vol,
00222                 fpp * electronRadius() / vol);
00223         return sld;
00224 }
00225 
00226 bool 
00227 InputData::calcXrayCoefficients(double&           fp, 
00228                                 double&           fpp,
00229                                 Element::Ptr ep,
00230                                 double            coeff,
00231                                 double            energy)
00232 {
00233         typedef MapTriple::const_iterator Iter;
00234         Iter end = ep->xrayCoefficients().end();
00235         Iter begin = ep->xrayCoefficients().begin();
00236         Iter it = ep->xrayCoefficients().find(energy);
00237         fp = 0.0, fpp = 0.0;
00238         // energy already in the map
00239         if (it != end) {
00240                 fp = (coeff * it->second.first);
00241                 fpp = (coeff * it->second.second);
00242         } else {
00243                 // interpolate missing energy
00244                 ep->addXrayCoefficient(energy, 0.0, 0.0);
00245                 it = ep->xrayCoefficients().find(energy);
00246                 Iter prev = it; prev--;
00247                 Iter next = it; next++;
00248                 if (it != end && it != begin && next != end) {
00249                         double prevEn = prev->first;
00250                         double nextEn = next->first;
00251 
00252                         double prevFp = prev->second.first;
00253                         double nextFp = next->second.first;
00254                         fp  = interpolate(prevEn, prevFp, 
00255                                           nextEn, nextFp, energy);
00256                         double prevFpp = prev->second.second;
00257                         double nextFpp = next->second.second;
00258                         fpp = interpolate(prevEn, prevFpp,
00259                                           nextEn, nextFpp, energy);
00260                 } else {
00261                         // given xray energy is out of range
00262                         // (of values in the map)
00263                         return false;
00264                 }
00265         }
00266         return true;
00267 }
00268 
00269 void 
00270 InputData::calcXrayEnergies(const CompleteList& cl,
00271                             const QVariantMap& partialVolumes,
00272                             const QVariantMap& partialElectrons)
00273 {
00274         QVariantMap xray, partialFp, partialFpp, partialSLD;
00275         double energy = 1000.0 * get("ntrXrayEn").toDouble();
00276         double totalFp = 0.0, totalFpp = 0.0;
00277 
00278         if (!partialVolumes.contains("value")) return;
00279         if (!partialElectrons.contains("value")) return;
00280         double totalVolume = 1e-8 * partialVolumes.value("value").toDouble();
00281         double totalElectrons = partialElectrons.value("value").toDouble();
00282 
00283         CompleteList::const_iterator elemIt = cl.begin();
00284         for(;elemIt != cl.end(); elemIt++) 
00285         {
00286                 Element::Ptr ep = elemIt->second;
00287                 if (ep->isIsotope()) {
00288                         ep = mDB->getElement(ElementDatabase::KeyType(ep->symbol().c_str()));
00289                         if (ep.isNull())
00290                         {
00291 #ifdef DEBUG
00292                                 std::cerr << "InputData::calcXrayEnergies: '"
00293                                         << ep->symbol().c_str()
00294                                         <<"' not found in Database !" << std::endl;
00295 #endif
00296                                 return; // avoid invalid value output
00297                         }
00298                 }
00299                 if (ep->xrayCoefficients().size() < 2)
00300                 {
00301 #ifdef DEBUG
00302                         std::cerr << "InputData::calcXrayEnergies: "
00303                                 << "Not enough X-ray energies found !"
00304                                 << std::endl;
00305 #endif
00306                         continue;
00307                 }
00308                 double fp = 0.0, fpp = 0.0;
00309                 bool ok = calcXrayCoefficients(fp, fpp, ep, 
00310                                         elemIt->first.coefficient(), energy);
00311                 if (!ok) {
00312 #ifdef DEBUG
00313                         std::cerr << "InputData::calcXrayEnergies, "
00314                                 << "Specified energy is out of bounds!"
00315                                 << std::endl;
00316 #endif
00317                         return;
00318                 }
00319 
00320                 // create element name from nucleon number and symbol
00321                 std::string nameStd = elemIt->first.uniqueName();
00322                 QString name = QString::fromStdString(nameStd);
00323                 // store partial xray scattering coefficients
00324                 partialFp.insert(name, QVariant(fp));
00325                 totalFp += fp;
00326                 partialFpp.insert(name, QVariant(fpp));
00327                 totalFpp += fpp;
00328 
00329                 // calculate partial SLDs
00330                 if (partialVolumes.contains(name)) {
00331                         double volume = 1e-8 * partialVolumes.value(name).toDouble();
00332                         double electrons = elemIt->first.coefficient() * ep->electrons();
00333                         complex sld = sldXray(electrons, fp, fpp, volume);
00334                         addComplex2Map(partialSLD, nameStd.c_str(), sld);
00335                 } else {
00336 #ifdef DEBUG
00337                         std::cerr << "partialVolumes empty!" << std::endl;
00338 #endif
00339                 }
00340 
00341         } // end for each element in list
00342         partialFp.insert("value", QVariant(totalFp));
00343         partialFpp.insert("value", QVariant(totalFpp));
00344         xray.insert("f'", QVariant(partialFp));
00345         xray.insert("f''", QVariant(partialFpp));
00346         // calculate SLD
00347         complex totalSLD = sldXray(totalElectrons, totalFp, totalFpp, totalVolume);
00348         addComplex2Map(partialSLD, "value", totalSLD);
00349         xray.insert("SLD cm^-2", QVariant(partialSLD));
00350         set("xray scattering", QVariant(xray));
00351 }
00352 
00353 void 
00354 InputData::calcData(const CompleteList& cl)
00355 {
00356         QVariantMap partialElectrons;
00357         calcElectrons(cl, partialElectrons);
00358 
00359         double totalMass = 0.0;
00360         double totalVolume = 0.0;
00361         QVariantMap partialVolumes;
00362         calcMassAndVolume(cl, partialVolumes, totalMass, totalVolume);
00363 
00364         QVariantMap neutron;
00365         calcNSL(cl, totalVolume, neutron, &Element::nslCoherent, "coherent scattering length 1e-15m", "SLD coherent 1/cm^2");
00366         calcNSL(cl, totalVolume, neutron, &Element::nslIncoherent, "incoherent scattering length 1e-15m", "SLD incoherent 1/cm^2");
00367         set("neutron scattering", QVariant(neutron));
00368 
00369         calcXrayEnergies(cl, partialVolumes, partialElectrons);
00370 }
00371 
00372 std::ostream& 
00373 std::operator<<(std::ostream& o, const InputData& ind)
00374 {
00375         InputData::QHashType::const_iterator it = ind.mData.begin();
00376         while (it != ind.mData.end() ) {
00377                 o << it.key().toLatin1().data();
00378                 o << ": ";
00379                 switch(it.value().type()) {
00380                         case QVariant::Double: 
00381                                 o << it.value().toDouble();
00382                                 break;
00383                         case QVariant::String: 
00384                                 o << it.value().toString().toLatin1().data();
00385                                 break;
00386                         default:
00387                                 o << "n/a";
00388                                 break;
00389                 }
00390                 o << std::endl;
00391                 it++;
00392         }
00393         return o;
00394 }

00396 ErrorUnknownElement::ErrorUnknownElement(const cfp::CompoundElement& e)
00397         : cfp::Error(0, 0)
00398 {
00399         std::string msg;
00400         msg.append("Unknown chemical element or isotope entered: '");
00401         msg.append(e.uniqueName());
00402         msg.append("' !");
00403         setMessage(msg);
00404 }
